casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Joseph WEXLER, Appellant. No. 102. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit Nov. 7, 1938. Irving Spieler, of New York City, (William Hughes Lewis, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City, (John K. Carroll, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
